ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions for converting among CIE XYZ, xyY, Lab, and Luv. Calculate Correlated Color Temperature (CCT) and the Planckian and daylight loci. The XYZs of some standard illuminants and some standard linear chromatic adaptation transforms (CATs) are included. Three standard color difference metrics are included.

Functions for converting among CIE XYZ, xyY, Lab, and Luv. Calculate Correlated Color Temperature (CCT) and the Planckian and daylight loci. The XYZs of some standard illuminants and some standard linear chromatic adaptation transforms (CATs) are included. Three standard color difference metrics are included.

name: r-spacesxyz
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6-0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-spacesxyz
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/spacesXYZ_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/spacesXYZ/spacesXYZ_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 72ea0abdd79af95939209060e30017744a2586bb387b4d10e3e3af11f2b67bb7

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-logger
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-logger

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('spacesXYZ')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('spacesXYZ')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=spacesXYZ
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Functions for converting among CIE XYZ, xyY, Lab, and Luv. Calculate Correlated Color Temperature (CCT) and the Planckian and daylight loci. The XYZs of some standard illuminants and some standard linear chromatic adaptation transforms (CATs) are included. Three standard color difference metrics are included.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
